briefTitle: Randomized, Controlled Study of CF Patients Between 3 Months and Less Than 7 Years
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Crossover Multi-Center Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Inhaled Tobramycin Nebuliser Solution (TOBIÂ®) for the Treatment of Early Infections of P. Aeruginosa in Cystic Fibrosis Subjects Aged From 3 Months to Less Than 7 Years
conditions: Treatment of Early Pulmonary Infections With P. Aeruginosa in Cystic Fibrosis Patients
summary: This study investigated the efficacy of inhaled TOBI treatment for early infections of P. aeruginosa in paediatric patients with cystic fibrosis.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants P Aeruginosa-free After Completion of the First Treatment Cycle
